title: How to Win a Stubborn Man's Heart

steps.title: Don’t make yourself available 24/7.
steps.content: Don’t make yourself available 24/7. If you seem too eager about hanging out with him, it could be a turn off. You don’t have to cancel plans, but don’t rearrange your life for him. If he hits you up and you’re busy, reschedule for a different day. [1] X Research source Make sure you’re not the only one initiating dates, too. Try to keep it about 50/50 to make sure he’s actually interested. If he never approaches you to hang out at all, it could mean he’s just not interested. If you find that you’re constantly the one to initiate dates or hangout times, it might be time to move on.

steps.title: If he sees you opening up, he’s more likely to do it too.
steps.content: If he sees you opening up, he’s more likely to do it too. Try to let him into your heart and share some intimate details about your life. You could tell him a story from your childhood, let him in on a secret, or tell him one of your most embarrassing moments. [2] X Research source Hopefully, he’ll feel safe enough to open up to you, too. Be vague about what you share, so he can ask you questions to get his undivided attention.

steps.title: Uplift him, support him, and just be there for him.
steps.content: Uplift him, support him, and just be there for him. If he’s not ready to call you his significant other yet, focus on being a really good friend. Eventually, you may just win him over enough to secure a romantic relationship with him. [3] X Research source Think about what you’d want from a good friend: a shoulder to cry on, a listening ear, or someone to just have fun with. Plus, showing him how caring you can be is a great way to show off your most empathetic and thoughtful qualities. Reader Poll: We asked 308 wikiHow readers and 46% of them agreed that the characteristic they value most in a potential partner is an empathetic and caring nature . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Remind him that you think he’s cute, funny, and sexy.
steps.content: Remind him that you think he’s cute, funny, and sexy. Laugh at his jokes, touch him on the arm or the hand, and lean in a little closer than you normally would. [4] X Expert Source Shana Tibi Certified Professional Matchmaker Expert Interview. 19 October 2021. Keep it light and playful to remind him that you’re here to have fun, and you might just win him over. [5] X Research source It might take a stubborn guy a little longer to flirt with you. This means you might have to lay it on a little thick at first! If he flirts back, that’s a great sign that he’s becoming more interested in you.

steps.title: What do you two like to do together?
steps.content: What do you two like to do together? Maybe you both read a lot, so you can spend time at a bookstore or the library. Or, maybe you two both like to surf, so you head out to the beach every Saturday. Try to do things that you both like together so he can see how compatible you are. [6] X Expert Source Shana Tibi Certified Professional Matchmaker Expert Interview. 19 October 2021. It’s always good to try new things, too! If he’s interested in something you’ve never done before, give it a go. He’ll see you’re open to new interests (and how fun you are). [7] X Research source

steps.title: Show off your sense of humor whenever you’re together.
steps.content: Show off your sense of humor whenever you’re together. Tell a few jokes or get corny to make him chuckle. If he has a ton of fun with you, he’ll probably start to like you even more. [8] X Research source This helps a ton if you two have a similar sense of humor.

steps.title: Let him see how comfortable you are around him.
steps.content: Let him see how comfortable you are around him. Don’t worry too much about how you look or what you’re wearing—instead, make silly faces and dance like nobody’s watching. It shows that you’re cool and confident, even when you look a little goofy. [9] X Research source Being silly around him will encourage him to let down his walls, too.

steps.title: Show him just how fun it would be if you two were dating.
steps.content: Show him just how fun it would be if you two were dating. [10] X Expert Source Shana Tibi Certified Professional Matchmaker Expert Interview. 19 October 2021. Plan fun outings like going hiking or checking out a new museum. If he has a good time, he’ll associate the memory with you (and how awesome you are). [11] X Research source You could try going on a picnic in the park, walking your animals together, taking a road trip to the beach, or even taking a weekend away together.

steps.title: Keep up with your own friends and hobbies.
steps.content: Keep up with your own friends and hobbies. Not only will this show him that you’re a well-rounded person who won’t be clingy, you’re also not rearranging your life for a man who is too stubborn to let you in. You can make him a priority in your life, but don’t sacrifice anything else for him. [12] X Research source Plus, if you two don’t work out, you can slip effortlessly back into your life without changing much.
